title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLM, chat or embedding providers.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like interface) with multi-user support and model management.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama models into the editor as a free Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Lightweight Slack/Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with readline, syntax highlighting and conversation history.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-nvidia-docker
summary: Official container images with CUDA runtime for GPU-accelerated inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles for Phi-3, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-reddit-discussion
summary: Reddit thread announcing Ollama v0.10 with built-in tool/function calling support.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion on running Ollama at home for private AI workflows.

title: ollama-streamlit-template
summary: Official Streamlit template repo for building chat apps powered by Ollama.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with full API coverage and examples.
